member.summary: Gets The Mount Command And Adding Values Needed To Mount

member.name: M:IEX.ElementaryActions.EPG.SF.VGW.Mount.TuneToDefaultChannel(System.String)
member.summary: Tune to a default channel after Mount. If not handled to tune from this method, it should return false else true.
member.param: Channel Number of the service where it needs to tune to
member.remarks: Handled to tune to default channel in this method as it cant be handle in Functionality.MountGw.vb

member.name: M:IEX.ElementaryActions.EPG.SF.VGW.TrickModes.VerifyEofBof(System.Int64,System.Double,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.param: Duration Of The Event Or Review Buffer
If True Checkes Review Buffer EOF/BOF
If True Review Buffer Is Full
If True Verifies EOF Else BOF
member.remarks:
Possible Error Codes:
320 - VerifyEofBofFailure
322 - VerificationFailure
328 - INIFailure
